overview: ARIA chart-topper Reece Mastin is giving fans (his Lil Rockers) an insight into his life and career in his ‘Behind Closed Doors’ DVD. The DVD will feature a 40 min documentary on Reece’s music career to date, with interviews from close friends and family and the mentor who discovered and developed him on X Factor – Guy Sebastian. The documentary gives fans an up-close-and-personal view into the life and world of Reece Mastin, featuring early footage and photos of Reece performing as a child and in his early bands. The DVD also features every film clip to date, including behind the scenes footage of the making of each and stripped-back acoustic performances by Reece of all his hits.
title: Reece Mastin: Behind Closed Doors
